Detailed Description

template<class ObjectType>
class stResult< ObjectType >

This class implements a query result. It will hold a set of pairs Object/Distance ordered by distance which constitutes the answer to a query. All query methods of all metric trees implemented by this library will return instances of this class.

In nearest neigbour queries and k-range queries, the result set may contain more than k results. It means that the greatest distance from sample to result has more than 1 object. In such cases, all objects whose distance from sample is equal to GetMaximumDistance() constitute the draw list.

As an extra capability, it can store information about the query but they will only be available if the query method supports this feature (this is an optional capability). See SetQueryInfo() for more details.

It also performs basic operations that allows the construction of the result set by the query procedures.

Author:
Fabio Jun Takada Chino (chino@icmc.usp.br)

Marcos Rodrigues Vieira (mrvieira@icmc.usp.br)

Adriano Siqueira Arantes (arantes@icmc.usp.br)

Member Enumeration Documentation

template<class ObjectType>
enum stResult::tQueryType
 

Define constants to query type.

Enumeration values:
UNKNOWN  Indicates that there is no information about the query.
RANGEQUERY  This is a result of a range query.
KNEARESTQUERY  This is a result of a k nearest neighbour query.
ESTIMATEKNEARESTQUERY  This is a result of a estimated k nearest neighbour query.
RINGQUERY  This is a result of a ring query.
KRINGQUERY  This is a result of a k ring query.
KANDRANGEQUERY  This is a result of a k AND range query.
KORRANGEQUERY  This is a result of a k OR range query.
POINTQUERY  This is a result of a Point query.
REVERSEDRANGEQUERY  This is a result of a Reverse of Range query.
KFARTHESTQUERY  This is a result of a K-Farthest query.

template<class ObjectType>
stResult< ObjectType >::stResult (  unsigned int  hint = 1  )  [inline]
 

This method will create a new instance of this class. The parameter hint is used to prepare this instance to hold at least hint results (it is not a upper bound limit).

Parameters:
hint The projected number of results (default = 1).

template<class ObjectType>
void stResult< ObjectType >::AddJoinedPair (  tObject *  obj,
tObject *  joinedObj,
stDistance  distance
)  [inline]
 

This method adds a joined pair Object/JoinedObject/distance to this result list.

Parameters:
obj The object.
joinedObj The joined object.
distance The distance from the sample object.
Warning:
There is no duplicate pair checking. All pairs will be added.

Definition at line 357 of file stResult.h.

template<class ObjectType>
void stResult< ObjectType >::SetQueryInfo (  tObject *  sample,
int  querytype,
stCount  k,
stDistance  radius,
bool  tie
)  [inline]
 

Adds information about the query. It is used by Query methods to add information about the query. Since it is optional, not all results will provide meaningful information about it.

Parameters:
sample The sample object (a copy of it).
querytype The query type (UNKNOWN, RANGEQUERY, KRANGEQUERY or KNEARESTQUERY)
k The value of k (if it makes sence).
radius The value of radius (if it makes sence).
tie The tie list. Default false;
Warning:
It do not changes the behavior of this result.
See also:
GetQueryType()

GetK()

GetRadius()

GetSample()

GetTie()

Adds information about the query. It is used by Query methods to add information about the query. Since it is optional, not all results will provide meaningful information about it.

k The value of k (if it makes sence).
radius The value of radius (if it makes sence).
innerRadius The value of inner radius (if it makes sence).
